title: Successful Public Speaking
description: COGNITO GUIDES - SUCCESSFUL PUBLIC SPEAKINGOne of the increasingly popular Cognito series this is a really helpful and practical guide from on how to make successful presentations at conferences, seminars and public gatherings. Packed with useful tips and ideas on how to really get your message across. Written by a professional presenter with many years experience this guide can help anyone to improve and perfect their presentation skills so that the make a real impact with the audience.
author: Kathleen Keene
